name: The Bracers of Yith'Sehta
data: It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The Bracers of Yith'Sehta possess the ability to 'allocate'
